text: Silence is a 2016 American British Italian Japanese Mexican Taiwanese period drama movie directed by Martin Scorsese and was the second version of the 1966 novel of same name by Shūsaku Endō. It stars Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver, Tadanobu Asano, Ciarán Hands, Liam Neeson, Shinya Tsukamoto, Issey Ogata, Ryo Kase and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Awards in 2017. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 drama movies Category:2010s American drama movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Martin Scorsese Category:Movies about religion Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Silence (2016 movie)
